issues.description: Implement a secure user authentication system with JWT tokens. The API should handle user login, logout, and token refresh operations.
acceptance_criteria: POST /api/auth/login accepts email and password, returns JWT token
POST /api/auth/logout invalidates the current token
POST /api/auth/refresh generates a new token from refresh token
All endpoints return appropriate HTTP status codes
Passwords must be validated (min 8 chars, 1 uppercase, 1 number)

issues.description: Create a React component that displays user profile information with edit capabilities. Should show avatar, name, email, and bio.
acceptance_criteria: Display user avatar with fallback to initials
Show editable fields: name, email, bio
Implement inline editing with save/cancel buttons
Show loading state while fetching data
Handle and display validation errors
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

issues.description: Build a search service that allows users to search products by name, category, and price range. Should support pagination and sorting.
acceptance_criteria: GET /api/products/search accepts query, category, minPrice, maxPrice params
Support pagination with page and limit parameters
Allow sorting by price, name, or relevance
Return total count for pagination UI
Implement fuzzy matching for product names
Cache frequently searched queries

issues.description: Build a reusable analytics widget component that displays key metrics with charts. Should support line, bar, and pie chart types.
acceptance_criteria: Accept data prop with labels and values
Support chart types: line, bar, pie
Show loading skeleton while data fetches
Display trend indicator (up/down arrow with percentage)
Tooltip on hover showing exact values
Export chart as PNG option

issues.description: Create a notification microservice that handles email, SMS, and push notifications. Should support templates and scheduling.
acceptance_criteria: POST /api/notifications/send accepts type, recipient, template, data
Support notification types: email, sms, push
Template system with variable substitution
Queue notifications for async processing
Schedule notifications for future delivery
Track delivery status and retry failed sends
